entry.title: Kit Kat Fruity Cereal - 1.5oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hershey's
Type: Chocolate
Price: 2.99

Craving Cereal For Dessert?

Introducing theÂ new Limited Edition Kit Kat Fruity Cereal Bar! Replace your late night cereal with this amazing treat! This sweet treat still contains the classic crispy wafers we all love, BUT is now covered in a fruity cereal flavor cream, with specs of cereal throughout! The flavour of this chocolate bar tastes literally like you're eating Froot Loops or Fruity Pebbles, that's how on point the flavour is!

Now the only thing we haven't tried is dipping this KitKat in milk! Try it and let us know how it tastes! Tag us on Instagram @candyfunhouse

entry.title: Reese's Nutrageous King Size - 87g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hershey's
Type: Chocolate
Price: 3.99

Reese's Nutrageous King Size Candy Bar

Reese's Nutrageous is a candy bar made by the Hershey Company that was first introduced in 1994. It may not be one of the oldest chocolate bars in the world, but like all Reese's products, it has staying power. It consists of Reese's Peanut Butter Cups topped with caramel covered roasted peanuts and and is covered with a chocolate coating.

Â 

87g
